body_html:
For the sake of backward compatibility. we should and cannot overwrite user provided the session_config. The approach we took now is safe as it flipped the default value only when session-config is not present.

Thinking forward for TF 2.0, this is a good default for between-graph training. Distribution strategy should overwrite it as Distritubiton strategy knows more information than the default Estimator framework.

For the sake of backward compatibility. we should and cannot overwrite user provided the session_config. The approach we took now is safe as it flipped the default value only when session-config is not present.
Thinking forward for TF 2.0, this is a good default for between-graph training. Distribution strategy should overwrite it as Distritubiton strategy knows more information than the default Estimator framework.
body:
For the sake of backward compatibility. we should and cannot overwrite user provided the session_config. The approach we took now is safe as it flipped the default value only when session-config is not present. 

Thinking forward for TF 2.0, this is a good default for between-graph training. Distribution strategy should overwrite it as Distritubiton strategy knows more information than the default Estimator framework.
